item.title: IAM
item.description: About IAM - AWS Identity and Access Management AWS IAM AWS IAM User Guide AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) allows to securely control user access to AWS services and resources. Designed for organizations with multiple users or systems that use AWS products such as Amazon EC2, Amazon RDS, and AWS Management Console. With IAM, you can centrally manage users, security credentials such as access keys, and permissions that control user access to AWS resources. There are three ways IAM authenticates a principal:
